Structs/SimulatorMerchant.html#/s:25Sudo.name: id
Structs/SimulatorMerchant.html#/s:25Sudo.abstract: ID of the merchant for use in simulated transaction requests.

Structs/SimulatorMerchant.html#/s:25Sudo.name: name
Structs/SimulatorMerchant.html#/s:25Sudo.abstract: Name of merchant - used as tranaction descriptions.

Structs/SimulatorMerchant.html#/s:25Sudo.name: declineAfterAuthorization
Structs/SimulatorMerchant.html#/s:25Sudo.abstract: Depicts that a transaction request made to this merchant will be authorized at the virtual cards service level, and then immediately declined once it

Structs/SimulatorMerchant.html#/s:25Sudo.name: declineBeforeAuthorization
Structs/SimulatorMerchant.html#/s:25Sudo.abstract: Depicts that a transaction request made to this merchant will be automatically declined before it reaches the authorization level at the Virtual Card

Structs/SimulatorMerchant.html#/s:25Sudo.name: updatedAt
Structs/SimulatorMerchant.html#/s:25Sudo.abstract: Date/timestamp that this resource was last updated.

Structs/SimulateAuthorizationResponse.ht.name: id
Structs/SimulateAuthorizationResponse.ht.abstract: ID of authorization response. If approved, ID may be used in subsequent incremental authorizations, reversals and debits.

Structs/SimulateAuthorizationResponse.ht.name: declineReason
Structs/SimulateAuthorizationResponse.ht.abstract: Decline reason code. Only present if not approved.

Structs/SimulateReversalInput.html#/s:25.name: authorizationId
Structs/SimulateReversalInput.html#/s:25.abstract: ID of previous successful authorization to which this reversal corresponds.

Structs/SimulateRefundInput.html#/s:25Su.name: debitId
Structs/SimulateRefundInput.html#/s:25Su.abstract: ID of previous successful debit to which this refund corresponds.

Structs/SimulateIncrementalAuthorization.name: authorizationId
Structs/SimulateIncrementalAuthorization.abstract: ID of previous successful authorization to which this incremental authorization corresponds.

Structs/SimulateDebitInput.html#/s:25Sud.name: authorizationId
Structs/SimulateDebitInput.html#/s:25Sud.abstract: ID of previous successful authorization to which this debit corresponds.

Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html#.name: amount
Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html#.abstract: Amount of transaction in merchant’s minor currency (e.g. cents for USD).

Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html#.name: merchantId
Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html#.abstract: ID of merchant to use in simulated authorization.

Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html#.name: expiry
Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html#.abstract: Simulation of card expiry entered by user at merchant checkout.

Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html#.name: billingAddress
Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html#.abstract: Simulation of billing address entered by user at merchant checkout. If absent, will be treated as a NOT_PROVIDED on the simulation for AVS check.

Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html#.name: csc
Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html#.abstract: Simulation of card security code entered by user at merchant checkout. If absent, will be treated as a NOT_PROVIDED on the simulation for the CSC

Structs/Expiry.html#/s:25SudoVirtualCard.name: mm
Structs/Expiry.html#/s:25SudoVirtualCard.abstract: Month specifier, in format MM. e.g. (7 == July).

Structs/Expiry.html#/s:25SudoVirtualCard.name: yyyy
Structs/Expiry.html#/s:25SudoVirtualCard.abstract: Year specifier, in format YYYY. e.g. (2020 == Year 2020).

Structs/CurrencyAmount.html#/s:25SudoVir.name: amount
Structs/CurrencyAmount.html#/s:25SudoVir.abstract: Amount of the currency in cents. 100 equals $1.00 if currency is USD.

Structs/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig..name: userPoolId
Structs/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig..abstract: User pool identitifer of the user pool being used for authentication.

Structs/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig..name: clientId
Structs/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig..abstract: User pool client identifier of the user pool’s client used for authentication.

Structs/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig..name: init(endpoint:region:apiKey:clientDatabasePrefix:)
Structs/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig..abstract: Initialize an instance of SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig. Use this initializer if using API_KEY as the method of authentication.

Structs/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig..name: init(endpoint:region:userPoolId:clientId:clientDatabasePrefix:)
Structs/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig..abstract: Initialize an instance of SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig. Use this initializer if using AMAZON_COGNITO_USER_POOLS as the method of authentication.

Structs/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig..name: SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig
Structs/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorConfig..abstract: Configuration for connecting to the Sudo VirtualCards Simulator Service via AppSync.

Structs/BillingAddress.html.name: BillingAddress
Structs/BillingAddress.html.abstract: Representation of an BillingAddress data structure for depicting a card/funding source billing address.

Structs/Expiry.html.name: Expiry
Structs/Expiry.html.abstract: Representation of an Expiry data structure for depicting a card expiration date.

Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html.name: SimulateAuthorizationInput
Structs/SimulateAuthorizationInput.html.abstract: Input to simulate an authorization request from a merchant.

Structs/SimulateDebitInput.html.name: SimulateDebitInput
Structs/SimulateDebitInput.html.abstract: Simulate a settlement of an authorized amount. Other attributes of the debit such as merchant info are derived from the original authorization identified by

Structs/SimulateIncrementalAuthorization.name: SimulateIncrementalAuthorizationInput
Structs/SimulateIncrementalAuthorization.abstract: Request to simulate an incremental authorization request from a merchant.

Structs/SimulateRefundInput.html.name: SimulateRefundInput
Structs/SimulateRefundInput.html.abstract: Input to simulate a refund request from a merchant.

Structs/SimulateReversalInput.html.name: SimulateReversalInput
Structs/SimulateReversalInput.html.abstract: Input to simulate a reversal request from a merchant.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClien.name: reset()
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClien.abstract: Resets any cached data, and purges any pending operations.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClien.name: simulateAuthorizationExpiryWithId(_:)
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClien.abstract: Simulate expory of a pending authorization expiry (.pending).

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClien.name: getSimulatorMerchants()
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClien.abstract: Retrieve a list of supported simulated merchants.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClien.name: getSimulatorConversionRates()
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClien.abstract: Retrieve a list of conversion rates of supported currencies.

Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClien.name: SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClient
Protocols/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClien.abstract: Client used to interface with the virtual cards service simulator.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: notSignedIn
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Not signed in.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: invalidConfig
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Configuration is invalid.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: cardNotFound
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Card information supplied did not match any record on the service.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: cardStateError
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Card is in a state that is considered irregular.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: transactionNotFound
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Transaction information supplied did not match a transaction on the service.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: currencyMismatch
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Two currency types do not match or are unsupported.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: merchantNotFound
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Merchant information supplied did not match a merchant on the service.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: excessiveReversal
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Attempt to reverse an amount larger than the remaining pending amount of an authorization

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: excessiveRefund
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Attempt to refund an amount larger than the remaining settled amount of a debit

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: alreadyExpired
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Attempt to expiry an authorization that is already expired

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: InvalidTransactionType
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Transaction type is invalid/illegal.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: simulateAuthorizationFailed
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Simulate authorization API call failed generically - this is generally a sign of a programmatic failure or bug within the kit.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: simulateIncrementalAuthorizationFailed
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Simulate incremental authorization API call failed generically - this is generally a sign of a programmatic failure or bug within the kit.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: simulateReversalFailed
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Simulate reversal API call failed generically - this is generally a sign of a programmatic failure or bug within the kit.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: simulateAuthorizationExpiryFailed
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Simulate authorization expiry API call failed generically - this is generally a sign of a programmatic failure or bug within the kit.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: simulateRefundFailed
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Simulate refund API call failed generically - this is generally a sign of a programmatic failure or bug within the kit.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: simulateCreditFailed
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Simulate credit API call failed generically - this is generally a sign of a programmatic failure or bug within the kit.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: simulateDebitFailed
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Simulate debit API call failed generically - this is generally a sign of a programmatic failure or bug within the kit.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: getSimulatorMerchantsFailed
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Get simulator merchants API call failed generically - this is generally a sign of a programmatic failure or bug within the kit.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: getSimulatorConversionRatesFailed
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Get simulator conversion rates API call failed generically - this is generally a sign of a programmatic failure or bug within the kit.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: notAuthorized
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Indicates that the request operation failed due to authorization error. This maybe due to the authentication

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: invalidRequest
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Operation failed due to an invalid request. This maybe due to the version mismatch between the

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: rateLimitExceeded
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Indicates that there were too many attempts at sending API requests within a short period of time.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: serviceError
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Indicates that an internal server error caused the operation to fail. The error is possibly transient and

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: graphQLError(description:)
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Indicates that a GraphQL error was returned by the backend.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: internalError(_:)
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: An internal error has occurred - contact the SudoPlatform team for more information.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: requestFailed(response:cause:)
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Indicates that the request failed due to connectivity, availability or access error.

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: fatalError(description:)
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Indicates that a fatal error occurred. This could be due to coding error, out-of-memory condition or other

Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.name: SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError
Enums/SudoVirtualCardsSimulatorError.htm.abstract: Errors receieved from virtual cards simulator.

Classes/DefaultSudoVirtualCardsSimulator.name: init(username:password:)
Classes/DefaultSudoVirtualCardsSimulator.abstract: Initialize a default Sudo virtual cards simulator instance.

Classes/DefaultSudoVirtualCardsSimulator.name: init(config:username:password:)
Classes/DefaultSudoVirtualCardsSimulator.abstract: Initialize a default Sudo virtual cards simulator instance.

Classes/DefaultSudoVirtualCardsSimulator.name: DefaultSudoVirtualCardsSimulatorClient
Classes/DefaultSudoVirtualCardsSimulator.abstract: Default Client API Endpoint for interacting with the virtual cards service simulator.
